[[Kidōmaru]] [[Summoning Technique|summon]]s [[Kyodaigumo]] high above his target. Kyodaigumo then produces a sac of baby spiders,<ref name="d2"/> which Kidōmaru cuts open to release them.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 194</ref> The many baby spiders rain down on the target, spinning out strings of [[chakra]] as they fall. Because the baby spiders are so numerous, targets cannot avoid all of them, inevitably leading them to be wrapped in the chakra strings. Once caught by the strings, it is extremely difficult to escape;<ref name="d2"/> upon falling prey to this technique, [[Neji Hyūga]] was unable to spin for his [[Eight Trigrams Palms Revolving Heaven]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 195</ref>
